snippet.title: 3 out of 10, EP 1: Welcome To Shovelworks - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
3 out of 10, EP 1: Welcome To Shovelworks is a mixture of cartoon and game, positioning itself as a gaming sitcom. Follow the misadventures of the world's worst game studio, constantly falling into absurd, but very real situations. Fully animated and voiced scenes let you plunge into the absurd world of Shovelworks. The story-driven minigames are steeped in satire and love and allow you to take a look behind the scenes of game development. You can skip, replay and rewind the streak at any time ... enjoy the 3 out of 10 world at your own pace.

Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHxh4520qdDRQ751oNjBa7A?sub_confirmation=1

#gametrailers
